thread.title: CONFIRMED: Ghana call-up budding Eintracht Braunschweig talent Phil Ofosu-Ayeh for Canada friendly
thread.title_full: CONFIRMED: Ghana call-up budding Eintracht Braunschweig talent Phil Ofosu-Ayeh for Canada friendly

title: CONFIRMED: Ghana call-up budding Eintracht Braunschweig talent Phil Ofosu-Ayeh for Canada friendly
text:
Sports News | 7 October 2015 21:55 CET CONFIRMED: Ghana call-up budding Eintracht Braunschweig talent Phil Ofosu-Ayeh for Canada friendly - www.ghanasoccernet.com Phil Ofosu-Ayeh 
Ghana coach Avram Grant has handed a surprise call-up to Eintracht Braunschweig defender Phil Ofosu-Ayeh for next week's friendly against Canada. 
The 23-year-old has been in top form for German Bundesliga II where he has made five appearances for the fourth-placed side after 10 matches. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
